body.p:
107
Oct 6th 3
Lieut W. P. King
Franklin -- Kentucky,
Sir,

Your letter to the Governor has referred to this office. There are no 3 months being recruited -- and upon satisfactiory being furnished this Department -- you will probability be allowed to transfer your from the 52nd Ky Regt. to some which you may select.

Respectfully
Your obdt Serv't
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen of Ky
